name: Fajoce
description:
Step-by-step game in which you have to kill the enemy team before he kills you. In each round, you have a certain amount of time to shoot one of the weapons, or skip the turn. You can also play with each other in turn. Thanks to an interesting gameplay and beautiful graphics from @HevnGrafix, you get a huge amount of positive emotions
Features of the game:
  • Use different weapons to destroy the enemy.
  • With weapons, you can destroy everything around.
  • The game levels are generated differently each time.
